text: Mirko Felicetti (born 15 July 1992) is an Italian snowboarder. He competed in the 2015 and 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Italy Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Mirko Felicetti
